channel.title: Halo movie!
channel.description: do any of u guys know if their is gonna be a halo movie based on all the games? including halo 3. if there was a halo movie it would probably sell really good.

item.title: Halo movie!
item.dc:creator: @webber webber
item.description:
@webber wrote:

Actually if you didn’t know, the game was made because of a book called Halo. Which I have read myself, the game is just the storyline of the book. It wouldn’t be a movie based off a game. It would be a movie based off a Book.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo movie!
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:4, topic:126406”][quote author=InfoManiac link=topic=176655.msg1623143#msg1623143 date=1185220708]
Who doesn’t know… They said they were going to make it when halo 1 was released… Still no movie. I’m sure it will be out by 2050.

Also, don’t expect it in the next 5 years.
[/quote]
halo wars, is a movie for halo and is coming out like in 6 months or smthin[br][size=1]Posted on: July 23, 2007, 09:49:38 AM[/size][hr]http://download.microsoft.com/download/9/8/e/98ee533a-af33-4a28-8f6f-b2b5f56d988e/HaloWars_ESRB_720p30_ST_8Mbps.wmv[/quote]

um…wow
2 things. look at file name and first 4 secs of movie
ESRB is the rating board that rates VIDEO GAMES, and it has a RP image in the video

2nd. Halo wars is a RTS game coming out.

edit:
3rd. The end of the video even shows the xbox 360 logo…

u honestly thought this was a movie?
